title: Microsoft’s $440 billion wipeout, and investors angry about OpenAI’s debt, explained
full_text: Microsoft’s $440 billion wipeout, and investors angry about OpenAI’s debt, explained. Microsoft’s stock has plummeted 12% due to a slight miss on revenue, showing how spooked investors are by the "spend now, profit later" AI market. Wall Streets years-long bet on AI is facing a severe test on Thursday, as investors might begin to view OpenAIand generative AI in generalnot as a catalyst for continuous growth, but as a source of s… [+3106 chars]
